entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:46 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esther 1:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
